abstracts.cdata!:
The objective of the Turkey - Third
            Export Finance Intermediation Loan (EFIL III), is to provide
            medium and long-term working capital and investment finance
            to private exporting enterprises, private banks and leasing
            companies (LCs) selected according to a set of
            pre-qualification and eligibility criteria. Subloans
            agreements will be entered into by TSKB with participating
            financial intermediaries (PFIs). Before approval by TSKB all
            subloans will be subject to an environmental review process
            consisting of an environmental screening, environmental
            impact assessment and environmental mitigation plan. The
            purpose of this operational manual is to introduce the PFIs
            to the decision-making process during the implementation. In
            addition to this process the PFIs have specific duties and
            responsibilities to ensure the successful implementation of
            the project
